name: Castlevania legends remake fanmade in rpg maker vx ace (Prototype)
name_original: Castlevania legends remake fanmade in rpg maker vx ace (Prototype)
description:
Fan game reimagination (Canceled)

this version of the prototype had its last update on 04/25/2020.
However I am making available on 16/09/2020.

Note that it can contain numerous bugs, as the project is temporarily canceled.

this prototype serves only as a function of curiosity and registration for laterity.



controls on the keyboard.
A - Jump
S - Whip
D - Subweapon
Q or W - switch between available subweapon
directional - Sonya Belmont move

if the vampire kiler is added
Holding the S turns the whip.

Prototype by Retro-heart

RetroHeartDev - Canal
